name: wolfslice
text: It was just a vasectomy!

name: deimosrising
text: Baseless slander!

name: kazad
text: Fifty dollars!

name: i_love_kate
text: THESE KNIVES!

name: ted0phile
text: Was it worth it?

name: ambala
text: They TRIED to neuter him.  now he wears an iron thong.

name: deancain29
text: Ray: "my junk can still thunder"

name: craigola
text: Ray is worth more than $50.

name: soticoto
text: I still wouldn't say no to a free fifty.

name: spectre
text: Onstad apparently had not yet settled some things about how the cats were to be portrayed -- Ray might be a real pet cat, Pat talks Jive, and Beef isn't depressed yet.

name: norrin
text: Has the whole "stuffed animal" aspect been abandoned completely in the modern strips?

name: semiquaver
text: Some of them are stuffed animals and some are real.  It is good to obfuscate the continuity as it allows Onstad more leeway with his plots and such.

name: rowboat
text: And none of them had kicked the nicotine yet. Well, I don't think Beef ever did.

name: gambolholic
text: When does Beef smoke?

name: rowboat
text: When you pass out drunk after having put it in the oven.

name: greenkoolayd
text: hell of clever

name: notcool
text: Chubbied for the meatloaf I killed in this fashion a week ago.

name: rowboat
text: I've killed more pizzas this way than Italy.

name: el_cameroni
text: Doesn't this mean Ray is as old as Phillipe? (HINT: It does)

name: estu
text: Maybe Philippe is 5 in otter years (so actually like 1 year old) but Ray is 5 in human years?

name: buttermoths
text:
That would make Ray...ummm...40 in cat years, no?
I think their first year is 12 years, and then all the rest are 7.

name: professorhazard
text: Regardless, it does nothing to explain how Ray and Beef grew up in the 1980s.

name: gouldgonewild
text: That was the Cat 1980's

name: semiquaver
text:
Oh HELL yes.

Though this could not have been realized at the time, Acheworld was created to give birth to this realization

name: mattylite
text: Phillipe used to be 5, now's he's 5, and far into the future he will be 5.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
except that it's a differen't Mr. Smuckles

alt text: Ray is not lost

name: gouldgonewild
text: No it's him, but Ray was lost. He's over at Tina's.

name: gouldgonewild
text: wasn't*

name: tekende
text: I think the "Mr. Smuckles" in the ad is not Ray.

name: recognizer
text:
Perhaps this ugly, slanderous rumor is the reason why Pat and Charley later insult their friend and uncle using their imagined aspects of his junk.

Also, this joke set me up for a huge laugh when Ray's last name was mentioned a second time.

name: hellofditties
text: Ray can't be the same age as Philippe.  That just doesn't work.

name: cdumas
text: Five in human years is like 35 in cat years.

name: budenhagen
text: Maybe this Mr. Smuckles is Ramses Luther? Or perhaps Dornheim?

name: hamscout
text:
Son, there have never been any losses in the Smuckles bloodline, genital or otherwise.

This must be some other cat.

name: ih8jonmayr
text: If anyone ever tried to neuter Ramses Luther, you can be certain they did not succeed and that they are dead.

name: seph
text: Ray would never answer to "Mr. Smuckles"

name: private_public
text: It is implied that Mr Smuckles has an owner. Ray owns a house and several cars though, so it's pretty safe to say that this is not Ray, surely?

name: taiga81
text: apparently DJ Ray got a little chubby this year too
